title: CamCard Business Card Reader (Western) 4.2.0
description:
CamCard, read your card, mind your business.
CamCard reads business cards and save instantly to phone Contacts. It syncs all your cards across smartphones, tablets, computers and the web app. 
Brand new AR Card feature allows you to better demonstrate yourself, your products and company by adding various contents in text, graphic, video, audio or file formats. It keeps you posted with the latest updates of your partners and brings you more business opportunities.
* More than 50 million professionalsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ choice around the world
* CamCard is a great example of how storing and sharing contact details has been brought up to date using smartphone technology -- BBC News
* Must-Have Apps for Salespeople Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Inc.com
* The business cards just jump into your phones. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s that easy to use! Ã¢â‚¬â€œ CBS TV
* Bringing Order to the Chaos of a Business Card Collection - The New York Times
* CamCard lets you quickly and accurately scan business cards into your iPhone, BlackBerry or Android-based device - New York Post
* Top Developer on Google Play Store
Device Requirements: Android 2.0+, auto-focusing camera, supporting Nexus, Droid, Desire, Galaxy and etc.
Why CamCard?
* Accurately Read any Business Cards within a Second: Say goodbye to keeping all your business cards, carrying them around and worrying about losing them.
* Save and Sync Cards across All devices: Own multiple devices and fed up with manually syncing the latest biz contact info on every one of them? Let CamCard do that for you.
* Brand New AR Card: Sometimes a business card is not enough to leave an impression. Start to add more personalized content to your business card and stand out of the rest.
* Easily Manage Cards: With CamCard, you can search, sort, group, merge your business cards, as well as setting password to secure your Card Holder.
Features
Better Demo Yourself with AR Card
* Augment Reality technology: add text, graphic, audio, video, files and links to your business card
* Once your AR Card is created, partners will read your cards 100% accurately with 200+ languages support
* Share AR Card via email, QR code and SMS
* Add or edit AR Card in CamCard web app
Read Business Cards Accurately
* Read any business card within a second by taking a photo of it
* Auto-detect text orientation and rotate card
* Smart-crop card images and enhance scan result 
* Offline read 12 languages including English, French, Spanish, Portuguese, German, Italian, Dutch, Swedish, Finnish, Danish, Norwegian, Hungarian 
* Batch scan multiple cards 
* Read email signature 
* Read QR Code on cards
Save and Sync across All Devices
* Sign up to sync all the cards to your CamCard account. You can access, edit and manage cards across smartphones, tablets, computers and the web.
* All your cards can be saved in CamCard Card Holder, as well as your phone Contacts
* Save contacts to different accounts, e.g. Gmail or Exchange account
* Backup your contacts and restore in CamCard
* Export all cards to vCard or Excel files
Easily Edit and Manage Cards
* Add card backside image
* Add notes to a card
* Locate field while editing information
* Edit, group, search, sort or export your cards 
* Merge with exiting contact
* Directly make phone calls, send SMS/email, browse web pages or locate address with map app in card detail page
* Set password to secure Card Holder
Share Cards via Various Methods
* Conveniently send your friendÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s contact information to other friends within CamCard
* Share contact information via Email, SMS, QR Code
* Search a contact in LinkedIn website and send an invitation
TIPS TO ACHIEVE BETTER READ A CARD:
* Capture a card in sufficient light
* Align biz cardÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s edges to viewfinderÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s edges as closely as possible
